errors.name: NumericalOverflow
errors.msg: Numerical overflow

errors.name: DerivedKeyInvalid
errors.msg: Derived key invalid

errors.name: AuctionAmountZero
errors.msg: Auction cannot have 0 auction amount

errors.name: AuctionTokenAccountBalanceInvalid
errors.msg: Auction token account must have the exact number of tokens planned to be auctioned off

errors.name: AuctionTokenAccountOwnerInvalid
errors.msg: Auction token account must be owned by program_as_signer

errors.name: FlippedPriceLevels
errors.msg: Auction max price level must be greater than or equal to min price level

errors.name: InvalidIntervals
errors.msg: Difference between max and min price must be divisible by price interval

errors.name: InvalidTime
errors.msg: Given start and end times are invalid

errors.name: UpdateAuctionAfterEnd
errors.msg: Cannot update an auction after it has passed the ending time

errors.name: UpdateAuctionStartAfterStart
errors.msg: Cannot update auction start time after it has already started

errors.name: AuctionNotAcceptingBids
errors.msg: Auction is currently not accepting bids

errors.name: AuctionNotStarted
errors.msg: Auction has not started yet

errors.name: AuctionEnded
errors.msg: Auction has already ended

errors.name: BidZeroAmount
errors.msg: Cannot bid for a zero amount

errors.name: BidPriceTooLow
errors.msg: Bid price is below the minimum accepted price

errors.name: BidPriceTooHigh
errors.msg: Bid price is above the maximum accepted price

errors.name: BidPriceNotInInterval
errors.msg: Bid price does not fall evenly into a price interval

errors.name: UnsupportedSequenceNumber
errors.msg: New sequence number will not be supported

errors.name: SequenceNumberMismatch
errors.msg: Given sequence number does not match expected sequence number

errors.name: UpdateBidLowerPrice
errors.msg: Cannot update bid to a lower price

errors.name: UpdateBidLowerAmount
errors.msg: Cannot update bid to a lower amount

errors.name: CannotSettleAuctionNotEnded
errors.msg: Cannot settle a bid when an auction has not ended

errors.name: AuctionTokenDelegateInvalid
errors.msg: Auction token delegate must be program

errors.name: MintAuctionNotEnded
errors.msg: Auction cannot mint at min price before it ends

errors.name: MintZeroAmount
errors.msg: Auction cannot mint zero tokens at min price

errors.name: MintAuctionNotSettled
errors.msg: Auction cannot mint at min price since all winning bids have not been settled
